attributes.action: Excecute the murderers of Drummer Lee Rigby
attributes.additional_details:
Calling for the execution by public hanging of the murderers of Drummer Lee Rigby. They were filmed both commiting the offence and admitting to it afterwards.

The execution should take place at a public gallows at the site they commited the murder, Drummer Rigby's unit should be allowed to carry out the sentence if they desire.
